content: अरति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dissatisfied, discontented. {@--2@} Dull, languid, restless. --तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Absence of pleasure or amusement, regarded as arising from the longings of love; स्वाभीष्टवस्त्वलाभेन चेतसो याऽनवस्थितिः . अरतिः सा <ls>S. D.</ls>; one of the ten states of love-lorn persons (अनंगदशा). {@--2@} Pain, distress; <ls>Ki. 10. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Anxiety, regret, uneasiness, agitation; संधत्ते भृशमरतिं हि सद्वियोगः <ls>Ki. 5. 51.</ls> {@--4@} Dissatisfaction, discontent. {@--5@} Languor, dulness. {@--6@} A bilious disease. --तिः [ऋ-अति] {@--1@} Anger, passion. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Going, moving quickly. {@--3@} Moving flame. {@--4@} Occupying, attacking. {@--5@} Servant, manager, assistant. {@--6@} A master. {@--7@} An intelligent being.
